For me, the Gregorian chant is heard a chorus of voices a cappella.
Which brings us to our next topic:
The instrumental accompaniment.
In part, it was adopted the original version.
in part, an attempt was made to create their own arrangements. Both with a lot of synthesizers and reverb,
giving an impression very "easy" of the product in question.

All in all it is not a pop album Gregorian thing to everyone.
